page.title: 01Middle Barton and Sandford.
page.content: Our 12km square area consists of these parishes:Westcott Barton,Sandford St Martin,Enstone(hamlet Gagingwell)and Steeple Barton.The main housing areas are in Middle Barton.Oxford and Banbury are our main shopping towns but our nearest town is Chipping Norton.We are about 16 miles away from Oxford and 12 miles away from Banbury.The main land cover in our area is cultivated land for it is the primary land cover in 10 of our squares.Quite a few of the people in our village are employed in Chipping Norton,Oxford and Banbury. There are also quite a few businesses in the village of Middle Barton and some in surrounding villages.The approximate number of people in Sandford and Middle Barton is 1,500.
